document.body:
Wood Back Fast Food Counter Stools
THE ONLY PLACE TO SIT in the 21st Century Fast Food Restaurant. This is a thoughtfully designed and engineered steel wood back counter stool with deluxe details like steel finial caps rather than the usual plastic. Our floor mounted Wood back design counter stools feature heavy duty commercial construction. The counter stools below are made in standard seat heights of approx. 18, 25 and 30 inches. These are custom made stools. Please call to discuss counter stool orders.
#504CST Wood Back Fast Food Bolt Down Counter Stool
#504CST Wood Back Fast Food Counter Stool available with Upholstered Seats and Beech Veneer Seats Seat is 17"Wide X 16"Deep Column is 3"Diameter Footrest Option Available. Equipped with return swivel Bolt down steel base . Optional 19"diameter footrest available. Stool base and chair head frame finish available in many Standard Colors including Clear Coat ( Clear Coat finish reveals welding and burnishing marks on the steel frame )
View From Rear
Finial Detail - Clearcoat Finish Over Raw Steel
Beech Veneer Seat Option
Pricing For Beech Veneer Seat Option 2 - 6 $300 each 7 - 10 $289 each 11 + Call for quote! Plus Shipping Charges June, 2012
Standard seat heights approx. 29", 24", 18". Footrest Option Also Available. Add $36
Upholstered Seat Option Pricing For Upholstered Seat Option 2 - 6 $292 each 7 - 10 $281 each 11 + Call for quote!
Comfortable, Upholstered seat. Click Here For Standard Upholstery Selections
Plus Shipping Charges June, 2012 Standard seat heights approx. 30", 25", 18". Footrest Option Also Available. Add $36
Beech Wood Veneer Seats and Back Standard Finishes:
Natural
Weathered Brown (Walnut Stain)
Ruby Red (Mahogany Stain)
Black
Special Stains By Request
